name: Mali Thai Restaurant
address: 2710 Main St, Vancouver, BC V5T 3E8, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: N1. Pad Thai
hasMenuItem.description:
(Vegan: on request) Stir fried noodles with tofu, egg, green onions, bean sprouts, and ground peanuts with tomato sauce.

*CANNOT be made gluten-free.
*for extra sauce, please select "Side N1 (Tomato Sauce)" in Side Orders Section.

hasMenuItem.name: C3. Green Curry
hasMenuItem.description:
Served with hot spiced green curry with eggplant, green beans, and basil leaves. 

*Rice NOT included
*No curries can be made gluten-free, vegetarian, or vegan.

hasMenuItem.name: A1. (4 pcs) Thai Spring Rolls
hasMenuItem.description:
(Vegan) 4 pieces. Fried spring rolls stuffed with bean thread noodles and vegetables, served with plum sauce. 

*CANNOT be made gluten-free.

hasMenuItem.name: N10. Mali Pad Thai (GF)
hasMenuItem.description:
(GF) An authentic pad Thai with egg, tofu, chives, and bean sprouts in tamarind sauce, topped with ground peanuts and cilantro. Contains fish sauce.

*CANNOT be made Vegan.
*for extra sauce, please select "Side N10 (Tamarind Sauce)" in Rice & Side Orders Menu Bar.

hasMenuItem.name: N4. Pad See Ew
hasMenuItem.description:
(GF or Vegan: on request) Stir-fried flat noodles with egg, broccoli, carrots, and bean sprouts in various soy sauces.

If selected Gluten-free it's mean not the authentic taste. The meaning of See Ew is Soy sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: C5. Panang Curry
hasMenuItem.description:
Saut√©ed thick red curry with bell peppers, and basil leaves, topped with sliced lime leaves.

*Rice NOT included
*No curries can be made gluten-free, vegetarian, or vegan.

hasMenuItem.name: C1. Yellow Curry
hasMenuItem.description:
Served with hot spiced yellow curry with potatoes, topped with fried onions, and cilantro.

*Rice NOT included
*No curries can be made gluten-free, vegetarian, or vegan.

hasMenuItem.name: A4. (4 pcs) Chicken Satay
hasMenuItem.description:
(4 pieces) Big size 250-300g of Chicken Tender marinated in a mixture of Thai spices and coconut milk. Served with Thai peanut sauce.
*CANNOT be made gluten-free.

hasMenuItem.name: C2. Red Curry
hasMenuItem.description:
Served with medium spiced red curry with bell peppers, pineapple, and basil leaves. 

*Rice NOT included
*No curries can be made gluten-free, vegetarian, or vegan.

hasMenuItem.name: N6. Pineapple Fried Rice
hasMenuItem.description: (GF or Vegan: on request) Stir-fried rice with egg, pineapple, tomatoes, onions, cashew nuts, and curry powder.

hasMenuItem.name: D3. Pad Ma Kua Yaw (Eggplant)
hasMenuItem.description:
(GF: on request) Stir-fried eggplant, onions, bell peppers, and basil leaves.

*Contain shrimp paste
*CANNOT be made vegetarian, or vegan.

hasMenuItem.name: Large Thai Jasmine (White) Rice
hasMenuItem.description: Steamed, fragrant jasmine rice from Thailand, is typically served as a generous portion to complement various dishes.

hasMenuItem.name: RC1. Yellow Curry
hasMenuItem.description:

*Come with Thai Jasmine Rice
*No curries can be made gluten-free, vegetarian, or vegan.

hasMenuItem.name: RD6. Pad Gra Tiem (Garlic Sauce)
hasMenuItem.description: (GF or Vegan: on request) Stir-fried mixed vegetables with garlic sauce. Come with Thai Jasmine Rice

hasMenuItem.description: (GF or Vegan: on request) Stir-fried onions, mushrooms, bell peppers, and ginger. Come with Thai Jasmine Rice

hasMenuItem.name: RD3. Pad Ma Kua Yaw (Eggplant)
hasMenuItem.description:

*Contain shrimp paste
*CANNOT be made vegetarian, or vegan.

hasMenuItem.name: RD10. Pad Nam Mun Hoi (Oyster Sauce)
hasMenuItem.description:

hasMenuItem.name: RD2. Pad Ma Maung Him Ma Paan (Cashew Nuts)
hasMenuItem.description:
(GF: on request) Stir-fried onions, bell peppers, carrots, celery, and cashew nuts. Come with Thai Jasmine Rice

*Contain shrimp paste
*CANNOT be made vegetarian, or vegan.

hasMenuItem.name: RD1. Pad Bai Gra Prow (Basil Leaves)
hasMenuItem.description:
(GF: on request) Stir-fried onions, bell peppers, mushrooms, and basil leaves.  Come with Thai Jasmine Rice.

*Contain shrimp paste
*CANNOT be made vegetarian, or vegan.

hasMenuItem.name: SIG3. Gaprow Gai Sub Kai Dao Rad Khao (Spicy Thai Basil Chicken)
hasMenuItem.description:
An authentic Thai Basil Chicken, stir-fried minced chicken with fresh Thai chili, garlic, and holy basil or hot basil (depending on the season), topped with fried egg, served with cucumber, Thai Jasmine White Rice, and Prik Nam Pla (Thai chili & fish sauce).   We usually cook it medium to spicy.

*CANNOT be made vegetarian, or vegan.

hasMenuItem.name: SIG1. Moo Tod Gratiem Kai Dao Rad Khao (Garlic Pepper Pork)
hasMenuItem.description:
Stir-fried pork with garlic, and pepper, topped with fried egg, green onion, and cilantro, served with steamed broccoli, Thai Jasmine White Rice, and Thai Sriracha sauce.

*CANNOT be made gluten-free, vegetarian, or vegan.

hasMenuItem.name: A11. Suea Rong Hai (Thai Grilled Beef Brisket)
hasMenuItem.description:
Grilled marinated beef brisket with Thai style sauce, sliced and served with Nam Jim Jeaw (spicy sour dipping sauce). We usually cook it medium to well done.

*CANNOT be made gluten-free, vegetarian, or vegan.

hasMenuItem.name: SIG2. Kai Jeow (Thai Omelette)
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried omelette with chopped green onions, topped with cilantro, served with steamed broccoli, Thai Jasmine White Rice, and Thai Sriracha sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: A10. Kor Moo Yang (Grilled Pork Jowl)
hasMenuItem.description:
Kor Moo Yang is juicy, tender, salty and sweet! Grilled pork jowl marinated with Thai style sauce, sliced and served with Nam Jim Jeaw (spicy sour dipping sauce)

*CANNOT be made gluten-free, vegetarian, or vegan.

hasMenuItem.name: Nom Yen (Thai Pink Milk)
hasMenuItem.description: Nom Yen is a sweet and creamy drink made from Salak syrup. Contain dairy. Can not remove an ingredient.

review.reviewBody: N10. Mali Pad Thai (GF)  easily the best Pad Thai I've had in Vancouver.  The noodles were maybe a tiny bit too soft, but it didn't detract from the taste.
One improvement:- the vegetable in  green curry should be in small chunks to make it easier to eat!

I've been on the hunt for authentic Pad Thai since coming back from travelling Thailand, and I've finally found it!! This dish is incredible and as authentic it gets.  Most places use the tomato based sauce (which I see is also option on the menu) but this one is delicious!

I ordered the green curry, white rice, spring rolls and peanut sauce. It was my first order from this restaurant.  All food  items were excellent. I ordered extra vegetables. They were  fresh and perfectly cooked as well. Portions were a good size. The flavours were deliciius. The meal arrived in good time.   I highly recommend this restaurant.
Literally the best soup in Vancouver! Sooooooooo good !
